subject: Programming
title: What Graphs Represent
description: A quick, practical guide to What Graphs Represent.

hook.text: Social networks, road maps, and the internet are all graphs in disguise.

buildup.text: A graph is a set of nodes connected by edges. Simple structure, infinite applications.

discovery.text: Facebook friends are nodes with edges. Roads connect city nodes. Web pages link to each other.

twist.text: Graphs can be directed or undirected, weighted or unweighted â€” and each type needs different algorithms.

climax.text: Most of the world's hardest computing problems boil down to graph problems.
